0.text: The bus conductor: You're welcome. Could someone please give a
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The bus conductor: You're welcome. Could someone please give a</prosody></speak>

2.text: Rusiru : Here, I'll give you mine.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rusiru'>Rusiru</phoneme> : Here, I'll give you mine.</prosody></speak>

3.text: Old lady: Thank you for being such a kind boy. Where are you going?
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Old lady: Thank you for being such a kind boy. Where are you going?</prosody></speak>

4.text: Rusiru : We are going to the hospital since my father was admitted there a few days ago.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rusiru'>Rusiru</phoneme> : We are going to the hospital since my father was admitted there a few days ago.</prosody></speak>

5.text: Old lady: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope he'll get well soon. I'm going there too as I have to see a doctor.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Old lady: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope he'll get well soon. I'm going there too as I have to see a doctor.</prosody></speak>

6.text: Mother: Rusiru, ring the bell.... move forward so we could get off quickly. Could you help the old lady to get off the bus?
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Mother: <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rusiru'>Rusiru</phoneme>, ring the bell.... move forward so we could get off quickly. Could you help the old lady to get off the bus?</prosody></speak>

10.text: 1. Who is at the bus stop? 2. Where are Rusiru and his mother going? 3. Why are they going there? 4. Who will help the old lady to get off the bus?
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. Who is at the bus stop? 2. Where are <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rusiru'>Rusiru</phoneme> and his mother going? 3. Why are they going there? 4. Who will help the old lady to get off the bus?</prosody></speak>

13.text: • We are going to the hospital since my father was admitted there
13.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• We are going to the hospital since my father was admitted there</prosody></speak>

14.text: a few days ago. • I'm going there too as I have to see a doctor. • Rusiru, ring the bell and move forward, so we could get off
14.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>a few days ago. • I'm going there too as I have to see a doctor. • <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rusiru'>Rusiru</phoneme>, ring the bell and move forward, so we could get off</prosody></speak>

16.text: The highlighted words are called conjunctions.
16.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The highlighted words are called conjunctions.</prosody></speak>
